title: 223Good for himposted7 hours agobywst445 commentsawardsharereportblock
content:
224 Good for him posted 7 hours ago by wst4 45 comments award share report block AlphaFox @alphafox • 21h Man eliminates 3 kids breaking into his home, and mother claims this was an excessive use of force - were his actions justified?
45 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save SmallestShil 35 points 7 hours ago Charge the parents. permalink award report block reply 16BeatsAOne 15 points 7 hours ago Good luck trying to find the fathers. permalink parent award report block reply Shitsbrokeyo 1 points 1 hour ago They just dropped the seed. It's her fault. permalink parent award report block reply CyanScales 14 points 6 hours ago Sue the mother for harassment. And for a new door/ crime scene cleaner. permalink parent award report block reply chickeninoven 1 points 59 minutes ago She should have to scrub the floor clean with her weave. permalink parent award report block reply AgnosticTemplar 27 points 7 hours ago "Dey wuz only tryna rob yall, y'din hava kill dem!" Blacks will excuse their own for literally anything. The mother should be the one given the death penalty. permalink award report block reply JerryNadlerBeltFund 20 points 6 hours ago Sure. . . At 57 seconds into the video:
"the veteran opened fire.  ONE OF THE TEENS FIRED BACK" Ok, so three teens who dindu nuffin armed thugs broke into a man's apartment and got their just reward. Had they gone in unarmed, they probably would have all given up, crying at the sound of the first shot.   But they escalated the situation and shot back, resulting a shootout that left them all dead. Anyway. permalink parent award report block reply 19American62Woman 13 points 7 hours ago I saw a video of boons being primitive. They asked the grandmother about the horrible behavior. I figured there would be a halfway decent response since she was so old but she stated that their behavior was commendable because of their passion. It’s who they are and I’m taking a hard pass. permalink parent award report block reply sod_off_shotgun 15 points 7 hours ago I'm giving a hard R permalink parent award report block reply SummTingWong 4 points 6 hours ago Dey wuz jus goin doh to doh raisin money foh kwire practice n sheeit. permalink parent award report block reply Wizard_Glick 19 points 7 hours ago You shoot until the threat is eliminated... permalink award report block reply AgnosticTemplar 5 points 6 hours ago Not enough ammo in the US for that, I'm afraid. Rope is reusable, though. permalink parent award report block reply boredrandomguy 18 points 6 hours ago "my son ONLY tried to rob you..." That bitch is fucking dumb as fuck.  The world is better off without her or her kids. permalink award report block reply Wrexxis780 2 points 2 hours ago At gunpoint too permalink parent award report block reply hannahb 15 points 7 hours ago Bet they won't do that again permalink award report block reply Justjayce 13 points 6 hours ago Translation...."my meal tickets are dead and I'm not getting that money anymore!" permalink award report block reply Meathe 3 points 4 hours ago Oh, that's a dark though.  Probably true, though. permalink parent award report block reply QSWO1 1 points 1 hour ago Oh snap. permalink parent award report block reply Dwoj 8 points 7 hours ago Yes it is justified! He was probably so scared for his life!! permalink award report block reply GeorgeBailey 7 points 6 hours ago I only hope that her other 4 to 6 children will lean from this and stick to shoplifting or drug dealing. Armed robbery is just too dangerous of a profession to get into. permalink award report block reply PlantTrees 6 points 6 hours ago The home invaders/burglars brought guns and broke in .. homeowner acted in self defense and should never have even been charged.  The 'authorities' should have ignored the mother of criminals demanding he be charged because victimizing him twice is wrong... If I were litigious I would say he should sue them and her for putting him through that. permalink award report block reply Wakenbake 5 points 6 hours ago Thi article has a picture of the "neighbor" so maybe the aame one but it doesnt describe breaking entering but a robbey in the front yard? https://www.11alive.com/article/news/local/conyers/conyers-attempted-robbery/85-d344d527-7110-4d98-b06e-d655c76c7ab0 permalink award report block reply T471 5 points 6 hours ago yes justified. Charge the parents? Absolutely charge them for child neglect resulting in the death of 2 minors. permalink award report block reply Scot 4 points 6 hours ago If she didn't want her EBT tickets to expire, she should have raised them better. permalink award report block reply ElevenMile 3 points 5 hours ago Veteran looks like he can barely walk.  I don't blame him for putting 9 rounds into each sack of shit. permalink award report block reply edxzxz 2 points 4 hours ago I'm 100% fine with this vet defending himself in his home, but 28 rounds fired would require him having more than 2 fully loaded guns or several extra magazines and reloading during the chaos of 3 armed thugs breaking into his home.  Guy had to have been pretty cool under fire.  He should sue the mothers of these thugs for damage to his home and costs of ammo. permalink parent award report block reply Maga305_47 3 points 6 hours ago Mother of the year. permalink award report block reply JiggsawCalrissian 2 points 6 hours ago Step 1: dont break in to people's homes Let's work on that before deciding if what this man did was too much or too little or just enough permalink award report block reply Lol_Garrus 2 points 5 hours ago AI slop.
